Object.Field: Copy of LKM File to SQL SQOOP

COMPONENT NAME: LKM File to SQL SQOOP COMPONENT VERSION: 1 AUTHOR: Oracle COMPATIBILITY: ODI 12.1.3.0.1 and above DESCRIPTION: This KM integrates data from HDFS files into a JDBC target. It executes the following steps: 1. Create a SQOOP configuration file 2. Load data using SQOOP into a work table on RDBMS 3. Drop the work table Additional information can be found on KM option descriptions as well as in the Oracle BigDataConnector User's Guide.
